title: RUMER
description: RUMER is the continuation of BAIN. This book is intended for an audience over the age of 18 due to strong sexual material. Polluted with fears of her past Rumer wasn't ready for a relationship, certainly not with Bain Bain didn't want one either, only one night stands. One night. A scratch to an itch was all it was supposed to be, except for now Bain can't get Rumer out of his head. Rumer doesn't want more than that one night, or so she tells herself. Can two people with heavy pasts create a future? Can Rumer convince Bain to take a chance on her?
author: A.L. Wood
